testcase.name: Should verify all key form elements are visible
Should display correct description when selecting subject heading
Should not allow submission when all fields are empty
Should show error when invalid email is entered
Should show error when message field is empty with valid email
Should show error when message contains only whitespace

failure.message: Timed out while waiting for element <div.alert.alert-danger> to be present for 5000 milliseconds. - expected "visible" but got: "not found" (5141ms)

testcase.name: Should show error when subject heading is not selected
Should successfully submit when all fields are valid
Should show error when email looks like valid but has extra characters

failure.message: Timed out while waiting for element <div.alert.alert-danger> to be present for 5000 milliseconds. - expected "visible" but got: "not found" (5348ms)

testcase.name: Should accept max local-part length email (64 chars before @)
Should accept email with alias (+ sign)
Should accept email with uppercase letters
Should successfully submit when order reference is too large
Should successfully submit with a valid file attached
Should show error for unsupported file type
